com.pilot.jword
Class ListLevel

java.lang.Object
  com.pilot.jword.ListLevel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class ListLevel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

Represents a level within a NumberedList. Some lists have a single level, while other may have up to 9 (0-8) levels.

Constructor Detail

ListLevel

public ListLevel(short level,
                 int numberType,
                 int bulletType,
                 int startAt,
                 int indent,
                 int hanging,
                 java.lang.String text,
                 short follower,
                 NumberedList list)
constructor

Parameters:
level - level no (0 based)
numberType - number type of the level
bulletType - bullet type of the level
startAt - start at
indent - indent (in twips)
hanging - number hanging (in twips)
text - level text format
follower - level follower
list - the list where this level belongs.
